website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use device that's worth a look for consumers who snore through their mouths.
pros: Works by keeping your mouth closed so you breathe through your nose while you sleep
Has an adjustable Velcro fastener for a personalized fit
cons: Won't work for all, especially those who tend to snore with their mouths closed

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable chin strap that will work well for many users once the fit is adjusted for individual needs.
pros: Has a Velcro fastener that makes it easy to adjust for a customizable fit
Lycra material is soft and stretchable
Price falls on the lower end of the scale
cons: Straps can leave marks on the skin, especially if not adjusted properly before falling asleep

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Literally STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I wouldn't sleep with my mouth open, which causes my throat to dry out, and it works well for that purpose. BUT, it smells very badly of rubber, and the only night I wore it I awoke to a bad, rubbery taste in my mouth that lasted a few hours. Worse, my throat was dry from breathing through my nose! So . . . FAIL. Bottom line: It works as advertised, but I won't wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C

customer_reviews.title: Kicked me out
customer_reviews.text: Well this didn't work for me I found it on my four head in the morning and another time on the floor the next day. keeping it on in your sleep is tuff. its a person to person case.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: What’s that smell?
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it works, but reeks of gasoline like smell that makes you face (and your home) smell the same.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleV

customer_reviews.title: Trouble sleeping?
customer_reviews.text: Don’t worry, you’ll pass out from the smell. (We’re talking Tire factory)
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Total wate of money, product which was delivered and described is totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Bhushan Sonaje

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: smells like a new basketball....offensive and doesn't fit....wate of money....
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat works
customer_reviews.text: Makes you sweat and hot on the face when wearing it and slips off your head . Laying on your back is best but moving positions makes it’s slip off your head
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m sending it back. It moves around and the Velcro straps get stuck in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: It's like wearing a wetsuit on your face. I put it on and immediately my face that it covered became slick with sweat. I didn't even last 20 minutes wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Willis

customer_reviews.title: Awful Chemical Smell!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how well it might work. Smells so terrible I couldn’t stand to wear it on my face to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Attack

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely as described, but seems like a decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Received head strap. Fast shipping, Fits well. Very minor poly smell. Did not come with nasal dilators or case as described in page. Will update with how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Very small, didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: "one size fits all* if you are a tiny person maybe. This didn't fit an adults head.
customer_reviews.author: pablo s.

customer_reviews.title: Looking to spend money to keep you snoring? Here ya go!
customer_reviews.text: I still snore. My girlfriend says it doesn’t help at all. Unless you strap the thing so tight that you give yourself a headache, you’re still able to open your mouth and snore.
customer_reviews.author: Will Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super itchy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The material is so itchy and uncomfortable that I couldn't even wear it for one night.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Might fit a child’s head but not my 7 1/4 head.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good idea that does not work well in reality.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried wearing this in various configurations. It only holds my mouth shut if set very tight, which is uncomfortable and causes pressure points. At any other “comfortable” setting, it actually pulls my jaw back, keeps my mouth slightly open, and makes it hard to breath while laying down. I could not sleep with this on, as it began to hurt over time from pressure points on my face. The smell of neoprene from the “wetsuit” like material is overwhelming and just as much of a reason why I could not continue wearing it through the night. It is an interesting idea that doesn’t execute well in reality.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Sanner

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless
customer_reviews.text: I have had another chin strap for over a year now and it works well to keep my mouth closed while I sleep. It prevents snoring and also waking up with a dry mouth. I bought this one hoping to have a spare to use while the first one is in the wash, but this one is really useless. The strap is too short to fit over my head unless I make it really tight. The ear-slots are not aligned correctly. The strap won't stay in place over my head. Do yourself a favor and find one that has dual head straps to hold it in place. Don't waste you money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like to sleep with tires!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worse purchase I have made on Amazon. I can't stomach the intense smell of this products. Aired it out, washed it as well, still can't get the smell out. Never wore it! Smell is too strong. Smells like rubber automobile tires. Sickening! Hope I can return it. If not I'm out the $10.59 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: 🤔
customer_reviews.text: So my x told me that I snore when I sleep, so I got this chin strap to help... When I got it I thought it would be more to it but its not... So when I put on it was uncomfortable but bearable I guess cause I have a fat face but it does fit, but make sure when u put it on that your ears go through the ear holes because when u put strap over head it will hurt if you dont... But he told me that it works he didnt hear me snore at all
customer_reviews.author: Assante Pope

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The solvent smell won't go away. It doesn't come with any instructions or identify which side is up. I tried using and it didn't stop my snoring but actually kept me awake because it was uncomfortable (and smelled like solvent). Thought I'd give it a try. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Prevent morning cotton mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use a CPAP and recently started using the strap to keep my mouth closed. I was waking up with dry cotton mouth. The strap prevents that.
customer_reviews.author: Retired happy

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: This took a while to get it adjusted properly. Though the material was some what comfortable, having it on wasn't. This did not rid me of the snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I use this item for a couple of nights and it's not really strong enough to keep my jaw shut. I found no benefit.
customer_reviews.author: ryan staniszeski

customer_reviews.title: It falls apart
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted 2 months and it stated breaking up into small black pieces. It also would not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Carrol D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to do anything and after a while of wearing it gets a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AaronS

customer_reviews.title: Strap
customer_reviews.text: The Strap needs to be wider on the head, it keeps falling off the back of my head and isn't secure.
customer_reviews.author: michael bird

product_meta.title: Anti Snoring Chin Strap, Stop Snoring Chin Strap, Advanced Anti Snoring Solution Devices, Snore Reducing Sleeping Aids Sleep Strap Snore Stopper Chin Straps for Snoring Women Men
